frameset.edef: to disperse or scatter, to dispel

example.parse: (PRT (PROG_PART بِ)) (IV3P+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:P يِحاوْلُوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP بِ) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الطَرِيقَة)) (NP (DEM_PRON_FS دِي)))) (SBAR (-NONE- 0) (S (VP (IV3P+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:P يُشتتُوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC ٱِنْتِباهَ) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))) (PP-PRP (PREP عَلَى) (NP (NOUN شَأْن) (S (S (VP (IV1P+IV نِسِيب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL الاساسيات)))) (CONJ وِ) (S (VP (IV1P+IV نِمْسِك) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP فِي) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL الفرعيات))))))))
